name: order-cicilan
title: Check Finance & Samsat
description: Melakukan pembayaran tagihan cicilan bulanan (finance) ke nomor kontrak pelanggan.

parameters.name: target_customer_id
parameters.label: Nomor Kontrak Pelanggan
parameters.placeholder: Nomor Kontrak atau ID Pelanggan finance

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/order-cicilan \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"target_customer_id":"9876543210", "voucher_id":"6001"}'
